title: Create 'recent files' helper utility
description: Create a utility that finds and lists recently modified .md files across all search locations (Documents, Downloads, Desktop, iCloud). Sort by modification time (newest first), show path and timestamp, limit to 10 most recent. This helps when user doesn't remember exact filename.
notes: Subtask of 89. COMPLETED: Added 'Recent Files Helper (Last Resort)' section to smart-bootstrap.md (lines 229-309). Implements interactive helper that searches all locations for .md files modified in last 7 days using mdfind (Spotlight) with find fallback. Shows top 10 results sorted by modification time with readable timestamps and file sizes. User can select from list or provide different path. Includes complete example interaction showing the selection flow. Final fallback after all path searches exhausted.
user_benefit: Users can see and select from recent .md files instead of remembering exact paths
